work.title: Software Engineer Intern (TIP)
work.description: Led a full-stack intern project to develop an internal tool to assist in generating configuration files/pre-set file structures and reading and writing from databases. Used React and Flask with Python to develop the application, which uses questionnaires to programmatically generate/use configuration data.

work.title: Student Manager
work.description: Answered IT help tickets and chats as a member of the ITSC at Brown University. Troubleshooted technology used around campus and provided technical support to both staff and students. Managed shifts and logistics for other technical assistants.

csProjects.title: ChordConstructor
csProjects.category: A program that, given a key and roman numeral selected by the user, displays and sounds the chord on a treble clef staff.

csProjects.title: Spothouse
csProjects.category: A webapp that allows a group of people to share and vote on a Spotify queue.

csProjects.title: JPEG Deblocker
csProjects.category: A convolutional neural network designed to remove blocking artifacts from JPEG images.

csProjects.title: LOL Outcome Predictor
csProjects.category: A deep learning model that can predict the outcome of a League of Legends game based on the characters the players choose.

csProjects.title: Tablator
csProjects.category: A webapp that uses a DP algorithm to find the three best guitar fingering paths for a input sequence of notes or midi file, and displays their tabs.

csProjects.title: Set Trainer
csProjects.category: A website that helps beginners improve at the card game Set.

csProjects.title: QuickFlash
csProjects.category: A webapp that uses deep learning to generate flashcards from paragraphs of text

csProjects.title: The Spotify Game
csProjects.category: Test your knowledge of musical artists and their popularities with The Spotify Game!

musicProjects.title: Pop Song
musicProjects.category: A short "pop song" written for my intro music theory class (NB: many of the chord symbols are outdated)

musicProjects.title: Sonata Exposition
musicProjects.category: A piano sonata exposition written for my intro music theory class

musicProjects.title: Tanabata Song
musicProjects.category: An SATB arrangement of the Japanese folk song "Tanabata"

musicProjects.title: In a Sentimental Mood
musicProjects.category: An arrangement of the jazz standard "In a Sentimental Mood" for melodica and strings of varyingly low octaves

musicProjects.title: Rainbow Funtime
musicProjects.category: My first project for my intro to composition class, a short two-movement piece for solo flute

musicProjects.title: Crossing the Bar
musicProjects.category: My second project for my intro to composition class, a song for soparano and piano set to text by Alfred, Lord Tennyson

musicProjects.title: Wormwood
musicProjects.category: My final project for my intro to production class, a slowcore/shoegaze song

musicProjects.title: midterm
musicProjects.category: Midterm project for my recording and sound design class. Used midi synths and recorded guitar and bass.

musicProjects.category: My final project for my recording and sound design class, a sort-of atonal rock song. Used midi guitar + recorded guitar and bass

musicProjects.title: Rainbow Funtime 2
musicProjects.category: The latest development in the rainbow funtime saga
